participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate, Emily is determined to pursue her dreams despite facing challenges. She loves expressing herself through music.
participant_1.background: My favorite type of music to sing is folk music. My parents are not very supportive of my dream. I am a musician and hope to make it big some day. I also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. I play the piano and guitar and sing.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Hardworking and down-to-earth, Jake enjoys the simple pleasures in life like sports and good food. He values hard work and has a strong work ethic.
participant_2.background: I am a construction worker. In my free time I like to watch NASCAR racing and UFC. My favorite food is Mexican food. I have been working since I was sixteen years old.

content.text: Hello!
Hello!
What do you do for work?
I am a construction worker.
That's cool! I've always been interested in construction.
It's a good job. It pays well and it's always in demand.
What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to watch NASCAR racing and UFC. I also like to eat Mexican food.
That sounds fun! I love NASCAR racing too.
It's a great sport! I've been watching it since I was a kid.
Me too! I love the excitement and the drama.
Yeah, it's definitely a thrilling sport.
Do you have a favorite driver?
I'm a fan of Kyle Larson. He's a great driver and he's always in contention for the win.
Me too! He's one of my favorites too.
Yeah, he's a lot of fun to watch.
What do you think of the new season so far?
It's been pretty good so far. There have been a lot of exciting races and some close finishes.
Yeah, I agree. It's been a lot of fun to watch.
I'm looking forward to the rest of the season.
Me too! It should be a lot of fun.
